    public disable(path: String | RegExp | undefined | null): Boolean source

    Disables the profiler for the given path, or if not given, for all previously configured paths.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    path String | RegExp | undefined | null

    Path which we want to stop profilling, if not given, all will be disabled.

    Return:

    Boolean

    public enable(path: String | RegExp, profile: String): Boolean source

    Enables the profiler for the given path or paths that match it with the given name.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    path String | RegExp

    Request path(s) that we want to profile/analyse.
    profile String

    Name where all the profile files will be stored.

    Return:

    Boolean
